title: How to Make Potica (Povitica or Nut Roll)

steps.headline: Preheat oven to 325 °F (163 °C).
Dissolve yeast in milk, add sugar and stir.
steps.description:
Cover with a towel for 10 minutes. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b3\/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/b3\/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-2Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Add milk and butter to a saucepan to prepare the dough.
steps.description:
Put it on medium heat and stir continuously until boiling. Lower the flame and let it cool until lukewarm. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1a\/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/1\/1a\/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Beat egg yolks, sugar, salt, and vanilla in a small electric mixer.
steps.description:
See the tips and video sections for pointers on separating egg yolks and whites. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/93\/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/9\/93\/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-4Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Place 3 cups of sifted flour in a large mixing bowl and combine it with the yeast mixture, milk/butter, and egg/sugar/salt/vanilla.
Beat with an electric mixer until smooth and elastic.
Knead dough for 15 minutes.
Put dough in a well greased bowl, cover with towel.
steps.description: Let the dough rise for 2 hours.

steps.headline: Make the walnut filling.
steps.description:
Melt butter then add milk, chocolate, honey, and sugar. Cook to a roiling boil. Stir continuously. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5c\/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-9Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-9Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5c\/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-9Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-9Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Put ground up walnuts into a bowl and pour butter/milk/chocolate/honey/sugar mixture over the walnuts.
Add vanilla and grated peel to the mixture.
steps.description:
Mix thoroughly and allow to cool. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6a\/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-11Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-11Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/6\/6a\/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-11Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-11Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Beat egg whites until stiff.
Create a small well in the center of the walnut mixture, and pour the egg whites in.
Fold walnut mixture over eggs and stir until evenly covered.
Place dough on floured table and roll to a large thin square.
Spread the walnut filling evenly to every corner of the dough.
Sprinkle with a generous amount of cinnamon.
Roll the dough into itself, as tightly as possible until it forms a tube-like roll.
Cut the roll to fit the greased pan of your choosing.
Cover the pan with a towel and allow it to rise for 1 hour.
steps.description: Bake for 1 hour or until medium brown.

steps.headline: Serve once cooled.

text:
Preheat oven to 325 °F (163 °C). Dissolve yeast in milk, add sugar and stir. Cover with a towel for 10 minutes. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b3/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-2Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b3/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-2Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-2Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Add milk and butter to a saucepan to prepare the dough. Put it on medium heat and stir continuously until boiling. Lower the flame and let it cool until lukewarm. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/1a/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/1a/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Beat egg yolks, sugar, salt, and vanilla in a small electric mixer. See the tips and video sections for pointers on separating egg yolks and whites. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/93/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-4Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/93/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-4Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-4Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Place 3 cups of sifted flour in a large mixing bowl and combine it with the yeast mixture, milk/butter, and egg/sugar/salt/vanilla. Beat with an electric mixer until smooth and elastic. Add more flour until the dough does not stick to the spoon. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/ce/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/ce/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-6Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Place dough on a floured table once it has reached a play-doh-like consistency. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/36/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-6Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-6Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/36/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-6Bullet2.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-6Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Knead dough for 15 minutes. Add flour if still sticky. Put dough in a well greased bowl, cover with towel. Let the dough rise for 2 hours. Make the walnut filling. Melt butter then add milk, chocolate, honey, and sugar. Cook to a roiling boil. Stir continuously. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5c/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-9Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-9Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5c/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-9Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-9Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Put ground up walnuts into a bowl and pour butter/milk/chocolate/honey/sugar mixture over the walnuts. Add vanilla and grated peel to the mixture. Mix thoroughly and allow to cool. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6a/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-11Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-11Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6a/Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-11Bullet1.jpg/v4-760px-Make-Potica-%28Povitica-or-Nut-Roll%29-Step-11Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Beat egg whites until stiff. Create a small well in the center of the walnut mixture, and pour the egg whites in. Fold walnut mixture over eggs and stir until evenly covered. Place dough on floured table and roll to a large thin square. Spread the walnut filling evenly to every corner of the dough. Sprinkle with a generous amount of cinnamon. Roll the dough into itself, as tightly as possible until it forms a tube-like roll. Cut the roll to fit the greased pan of your choosing. Cover the pan with a towel and allow it to rise for 1 hour. Bake for 1 hour or until medium brown. Serve once cooled.
